author: Maryn McKenna
title: We Need a Covid-19 Vaccine—Let’s Get It Right the First Time
description: The flu shot campaigns of 1976 and 2009 offer key lessons for how (and how not) to distribute, monitor and communicate about vaccines. But will anyone listen?
content: On a rainy night in January, 1976, a batch of new Army recruits training at Fort Dix, New Jersey were sent on a 5-mile march. The next day, one of the recruits, Private David Lewis, collapsed with severe pneumonia. Lewis died, and a whole swath of his platoon… [+4526 chars]
